snippet: Lawmakers say the Postal Service is not complying with a Congressional mandate to deliver letters six days a week.
lead_paragraph: Lawmakers say the Postal Service is not complying with a Congressional mandate to deliver letters six days a week.

headline.seo: Saturday Mail Delivery Cut Is Subject of Senate Hearing
headline.main: Lawmakers to Press Postal Officials on Decision to End Saturday Mail Delivery
headline.print_headline: Lawmakers to Press Postal Officials on Decision to End Saturday Mail Delivery
